str2: Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.
Restitution, reestablishment, restoration. From apokathistemi; reconstitution.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Plural

str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
From a compound of pro and phemi; a foreteller; by analogy, an inspired speaker; by extension, a poet.
